item.title: Understanding Hugo Shortcodes
item.author: dailytimeai@gmail.com (John Liu)
item.description: Hugo shortcodes are powerful tools for adding custom HTML or other special content within Markdown files without complex code. They enable enhanced flexibility and are a core part of Hugo’s functionality, offering reusable snippets for embedding media, custom components, or dynamic content.
